messages.inline_Help:
*How to use Inline mode?* 

*1.* Go to the chat where you want to share the current playback. 
*2.* Enter one of the commands: 
*@JarvisMusicalBot share* _- Share Now Playing Song_ 

*@JarvisMusicalBot share context* _- Share Now Playing Context (Album, Artist, Playlist)_ 

*@JarvisMusicalBot search REQUEST* _- Find a song through search (e.g. @JarvisMusicalBot search space oddity)_ 

*3.* Click on the picture or song that will appear near the input line. 
*4.* Congratulations, you shared the content! 

If your friend is logged into *Jarvis*, when he clicks the *'Play on Spotify'* button, his *Spotify* client will play the content that you shared.

easter_Eggs.britt_Robertson:
*Hmm, let me take a look ðŸ¤”* 

If this isn't a photo of *Brittany Robertson*, then don't even try.
easter_Eggs.blade_Runner:
I've seen things, you people wouldn't believe, hmm. 

Attack ships on fire off the shoulder of Orion. 

I've watched see Beams glitter in the dark near the Tannhauser Gate. 

All those moments, will be lost in time like tears in rain...

errors.cannot_Authorize:
*I cannot authorize you on Spotify.* 

Maybe you have blocked the bot in your *Spotify* account, use the /logout command and log in again.
errors.servers_Link_Error:
Unable to connect to *Spotify* servers. 

Perhaps this is *Spotify* server error, and you need to wait.
errors.unknown_Error:
*Unknown error.* 

If the error persists, contact the developer via the */contacts* command
errors.denied_Work_Reason:
*Data processing in progress.* 

At the moment, you can not use this function, please wait.
errors.start_Playing_NoDevice:
*Unable to start playback.* 

No active devices.
errors.start_Playing_PremiumRequired:

Spotify Premium subscription is required.
errors.start_Playing_RequestError:
*Unable to start playback.* 

Unable to process media-request.

*Your music library is not enough songs.* 

The minimum number of songs for this feature is: *{songs_Count}*
errors.not_Enough_Songs:
*Your music library is not enough songs.* 

Listen and add more songs to your library and the feature will become available.

notifications.preview_Not_Available: Preview not available for this song.

You can use the */menu* command to return to the main menu.

yourTops.yourTops_Description:
In this section, you can find your *Top Artists*, and your *Top Songs* for a certain period of time. 

If you create *Top Songs* list again a little later, you will see which songs you listened more often, less often, or which new songs appeared in your *Top*.
yourTops.select_Top_Type: Which Top do you want to see?
yourTops.insufficient_Data_For_Top:
*Not enough data to display the tops.* 

Listen to the songs more often, and someday the data will appear.
yourTops.database_Error:
*Error occurred while loading the Top.* 

Try to *(/logout)*, and log in back to Jarvis.

superShuffle.tracks_Count_Question: How many songs should I add to the playlist?
superShuffle.superShuffle_Description:
The *Super-Shuffle* takes all the songs from your *Liked Songs* section and just shuffles them so many times and then creates a new playlist where it puts those songs. 

*The minimum number of songs in the Liked Songs section should be 100.*

musicQuiz.musicQuiz_Question: Listen the song, and select an answer ðŸ¤”
musicQuiz.musicQuiz_Rules:
The *Music Quiz* consists of 10 songs from your music library. 

*Rules of the game:* 
1. You are given a 30 second segment of a song. 
2. You are given 10 seconds to answer, if you did not answer in time - the answer will be considered incorrect. 
3. You are given four choices, one of which is correct. 
4. Don't cheat! ðŸ¤” 

You can exit the game by entering the command */menu*

blocked_Tracks.description:
In this section you can see which tracks are blocked in your Liked Songs section. 

*Spotify has algorithms to find a substitute for a blocked song, so if a song is on this list, it cannot be played at all.*
blocked_Tracks.blocked_Songs_Number: Number of blocked songs (Of the total): {blocked_Number} / {total_Number}

authorization.spotify_Login_Offer:
Hi, i'm *Jarvis*, Your personal Spotify bot. 

It seems you are not signed in to your *Spotify* account. Please log in to your account. 

*You can disconnect your account at any time using the /logout command.*
authorization.choose_Language:
Choose language 

*You can always change language via /language command*
authorization.user_Leaving:
I'm sorry that you are leaving. ðŸ˜­ 
If you have any problems, you can contact us via the /contacts command.
authorization.disable_Bot: *To completely disable the Jarvis, go to the Spotify website.*
authorization.auth_Complete:
Welcome aboard, *{user_Nickname}!* 

Your *Spotify* account is successfully connected! 

*Some useful commands:* 
*/language* - Change Bot language 
*/menu* - Return to main menu 
*/logout* - Disable bot for your account 
*/contacts* - Contacts for communication with the developer 

*Using Inline Mode:* 
*@JarvisMusicalBot share* _- Share Now Playing Song_ 

*@JarvisMusicalBot share context* _- Share Now Playing Context (Album, Artist, Playlist)_ 

*@JarvisMusicalBot search REQUEST* _- Find a song through search (e.g. @JarvisMusicalBot search space oddity)_ 

Follow the instructions in the menu to get more information on working with Inline mode. 

Enjoy the bot. 
If you have any questions, you can contact the developer.
authorization.developer_Contacts: Having problems? Have questions? Want to report a bug?
